languages.text: {n}Чем дольше вы слушаете, тем больше слова проповеди начинают слипаться в единое неразборчивое гудение. Зудение в ушах превращается в сверлящую боль, которая сдавливает виски, сжимает шею — и стелется все ниже, к самому сердцу, которое пронзает ледяной иглой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Чем дольше вы слушаете, тем больше слова проповеди начинают слипаться в единое неразборчивое гудение. Зудение в ушах превращается в сверляшую боль, которая сдавливает виски, сжимает шею — и стелится все ниже, к самому сердцу, которое пронзает ледяной иглой.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The longer you listen, the more the words of the sermon blur together into incoherent humming. The itch in your ears turns into drilling pain that crushes your temples and squeezes your neck — and spreads downward, to your very heart, which it pierces with an icy needle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Чем дольше вы слушаете, тем больше слова проповеди начинают слипаться в единое неразборчивое гудение. Зудение в ушах превращается в сверлящую боль, которая сдавливает виски, сжимает шею — и стелется все ниже, к самому сердцу, которое пронзает ледяной иглой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The longer you listen, the more the words of the sermon blur together into incoherent humming. The itch in your ears turns into drilling pain that is crushing your temples, squeezing your neck — and spreading downward, to your very heart, which it pierces with an icy needle.{/n}

{n}The longer you listen, the more the words of the sermon blur together into incoherent humming. The itch in your ears turns into drilling pain that is crushing your temples, squeezing your neck — and spreading downward, to your very heart, which it pierces with an icy needle.{/n}

{n}The longer you listen, the more the words of the sermon blur together into incoherent humming. The itch in your ears turns into drilling pain that crushes your temples and squeezes your neck — and spreads downward, to your very heart, which it pierces with an icy needle.{/n}

{n}The longer you listen, the more the words of the sermon blur together into incoherent humming. The itch in your ears turns into drilling pain that crushes your temples and squeezes your neck — and spreads downward, to your very heart, which it pierces with an icy needle.{/n}

{n}The longer you listen, the more the words of the sermon blur together into incoherent humming. The itch in your ears turns into drilling pain that crushes your temples and squeezes your neck — and spreads downward, to your very heart, which it pierces with an icy needle.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你听得越久，布道的话语就越是模糊，变成了不连贯的哼唱。你耳朵里刺痒的感觉，渐渐变成了钻心的疼痛，压迫着你的太阳穴，挤压着你的脖子。疼痛一路向下蔓延，延伸到你的心脏，仿佛冰冷的针一样刺了进去。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you listen, the more the words of the sermon blur together into incoherent humming. The itch in your ears turns into drilling pain that crushes your temples and squeezes your neck — and spreads downward, to your very heart, which it pierces with an icy needle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你听得越久，布道的话语就越是模糊，变成了不连贯的哼唱。你耳朵里刺痒的感觉，渐渐变成了钻心的疼痛，压迫着你的太阳穴，挤压着你的脖子。疼痛一路向下蔓延，延伸到你的心脏，仿佛冰冷的针一样刺了进去。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuanto más escuchas, más se emborronan las palabras del sermón, convirtiéndose en poco más que un murmullo incoherente. El picor de tus orejas se convierte en un dolor perforador que te atraviesa los tímpanos y te aprieta el cuello, extendiéndose desde ahí hasta llegar a tu corazón, el cual perfora con una aguja helada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you listen, the more the words of the sermon blur together into incoherent humming. The itch in your ears turns into drilling pain that crushes your temples and squeezes your neck — and spreads downward, to your very heart, which it pierces with an icy needle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuanto más escuchas, más se emborronan las palabras del sermón, convirtiéndose en poco más que un murmullo incoherente. El picor de tus orejas se convierte en un dolor perforador que te atraviesa los tímpanos y te aprieta el cuello, extendiéndose desde ahí hasta llegar a tu corazón, el cual perfora con una aguja helada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}聞けば聞くほど、説教の言葉はどれもボヤボヤとしており、チグハグな鼻歌のように聞こえてくる。くすぐったいような耳の感覚は、こめかみを潰して首を絞めてくるガンガンとした痛みに変わった…その痛みは下へと伸び、心臓を氷の針で突き刺されるような痛みになる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you listen, the more the words of the sermon blur together into incoherent humming. The itch in your ears turns into drilling pain that crushes your temples and squeezes your neck — and spreads downward, to your very heart, which it pierces with an icy needle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}聞けば聞くほど、説教の言葉はどれもボヤボヤとしており、チグハグな鼻歌のように聞こえてくる。くすぐったいような耳の感覚は、こめかみを潰して首を絞めてくるガンガンとした痛みに変わった…その痛みは下へと伸び、心臓を氷の針で突き刺されるような痛みになる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Je länger du zuhörst, desto mehr verschmelzen die Worte der Predigt zu einem unverständlichen Summen. Das Jucken in deinen Ohren wird zu einem bohrenden Schmerz, der deine Schläfen sprengt und deinen Hals verengt – und sich nach unten ausbreitet, zu deinem Herzen, das er mit einer Eisnadel durchbohrt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you listen, the more the words of the sermon blur together into incoherent humming. The itch in your ears turns into drilling pain that crushes your temples and squeezes your neck — and spreads downward, to your very heart, which it pierces with an icy needle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Je länger du zuhörst, desto mehr verschmelzen die Worte der Predigt zu einem unverständlichen Summen. Das Jucken in deinen Ohren wird zu einem bohrenden Schmerz, der deine Schläfen sprengt und deinen Hals verengt – und sich nach unten ausbreitet, zu deinem Herzen, das er mit einer Eisnadel durchbohrt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Plus vous écoutez et plus les paroles du sermon se fondent en un bourdonnement incohérent. La démangeaison de vos oreilles se transforme en une douleur perçante qui vous broie les tempes et vous étrangle... avant de se propager jusqu'à votre cœur qu'elle transperce d'une aiguille glacée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you listen, the more the words of the sermon blur together into incoherent humming. The itch in your ears turns into drilling pain that crushes your temples and squeezes your neck — and spreads downward, to your very heart, which it pierces with an icy needle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plus vous écoutez et plus les paroles du sermon se fondent en un bourdonnement incohérent. La démangeaison de vos oreilles se transforme en une douleur perçante qui vous broie les tempes et vous étrangle... avant de se propager jusqu'à votre cœur qu'elle transperce d'une aiguille glacée.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dinledikçe vaazın sözleri birbirine karışıyor, ayırt edememeye başlıyorsun. Kulaklarındaki kaşıntı; şakaklarını ezip boğazını sıkan, aşağılara yayılıp kalbine buzdan iğne misali saplanan, delici bir ağrıya dönüşüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The longer you listen, the more the words of the sermon blur together into incoherent humming. The itch in your ears turns into drilling pain that crushes your temples and squeezes your neck — and spreads downward, to your very heart, which it pierces with an icy needle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dinledikçe vaazın sözleri birbirine karışıyor ve ayırt edememeye başlıyorsun. Kulaklarındaki kaşıntı, şakaklarını ezip boğazını sıkan delip geçici bir ağrıya dönüşüyor ve aşağılara yayılıp kalbine buzdan iğne misali saplanıyor.{/n}
